text: They're never one to shy away from a social media PDA. And Victoria and David Beckham made sure to share one on one of the most special nights of the year, as they enjoyed a New Year's Eve kiss on Thursday. Posted by the 40 - year - old retired footballer on his oft - used Instagram page, the sweet image showed him puckering up to his wife as they kissed in front of a tree covered in fairy lights.
